main event: A civilian rancher in Ferron, Utah, observed a football-shaped object with flashing green lights on either end through 7 x 50 binoculars on November 6, 1957. The object was described as unusually large, high, and moving at a high rate of speed for 2-3 minutes.
interesting points: The observed object was described as a vertical football shape with flashing green lights on either end and a flashing red light in the center.
The rancher used 7 x 50 binoculars and reported the object to be unusually large and high, moving at a high rate of speed.
The object was observed for around 2-3 minutes with no specific light in the center.
The observer had a clear and calm weather with a visibility of 4.2 plus and no existing physical evidence was reported.
No interceptors or air traffic were reported in the area during the observation.
sighted object: football-shaped object with flashing green lights on either end
